pullrequest.title: Adding gps mesh, collisions and inertia

content.raw:
There’s another pull request coming up to add the computer boxes on the top, as well as the batteries. I thought that the “mast” might help receiving the GPS signal in the presence of other close objects \(boxes\) but maybe we went too far :slight_smile: I see your point about being as low as possible. 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2274519574-gps_payload.png)
The png file is the texture for the GPS mesh. I’m talking with Cole, our 3D wizard, about lowering the resolution. I agree that 4MB is probably too big.
content.html:
There’s another pull request coming up to add the computer boxes on the top, as well as the batteries. I thought that the “mast” might help receiving the GPS signal in the presence of other close objects (boxes) but maybe we went too far I see your point about being as low as possible.

The png file is the texture for the GPS mesh. I’m talking with Cole, our 3D wizard, about lowering the resolution. I agree that 4MB is probably too big.
